alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL HARDING, NORTHEASTERN QUAY AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bueyeros to 7 miles southeast of Nara Visa. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amistad, Nara Visa, Bueyeros, Hayden, Sedan and Rosebud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Motorists can expect brief but sudden changes in visibility and ponding of water on highways as storms move through the area. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northeastern and east central New Mexico.

area.areaDesc: Harding County; Quay County; Union County
